im swedish...
what swedish version r u reffering to? a swedish DTV rip? and who do u mean is annoying? the uploader? or the narrator at the eurovision? ...i dont get it, but i havent downloaded this yet so perhaps i will soon know what u mean
the narrator is the annoyance...he seems to find it imposable to simply shut the fuck up.... he makes it almost not worth watching

The commentary is so irritating that I deleted this.  If you actually want to watch this for the music, don't waste your time.  Opening act is completely talk over & he consistently talks into the performances... and he isn't even remotely entertaining.  Fail.
